scenes.intro_text: Following your successful exploration, you uncover a hidden entrance to a vast, circular library. Dust motes dance in the single beam of light piercing the gloom. In the center, a pedestal holds a single, heavy tome, its pages whispering with an unseen wind. To read it, you must first prove your wit.

challenge.riddle_text: I have no voice, but I tell all tales. I have no body, but I hold many lives. I can be opened, but have no doors. What am I?

scenes.intro_text: As your fingers brush the ancient leather, the whispers intensify. Glyphs on the page begin to glow in a specific, mesmerizing order before fading. A section of the wall slides away, revealing a path forward, blocked by a stone panel that hums with the same magical energy, waiting for you to replicate the sequence.
